reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made with great color accuracy, and one mentions its cute buttons. The garment receives positive feedback for its fit, size, softness, and material quality. Opinions about the weight are mixed, with some appreciating its nice weight while others find it a bit heavy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and vibrant colors
items.body: I never write reviews, but I was so pleasantly surprised by the quality of this sweater that I felt I needed to. Sweater is the perfect weight and the colors are vibrant. It is made out of a material that doesn't seem like it will pill. I saw other reviewers saying that the wristband were snug, but they were perfect for me. I bought the medium and it fits just the way I wanted (slightly oversized). I would highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Deborah Mellor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, unique
items.body: Exactly as pictured and quality knit material. I absolutely love love this darling sweater. I imagine wearing it a lot of different ways. I ordered a Med is the perfect size I’m 5’ 4 , 135-140 petite . Read more
items.author: bootsie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just not for me.
items.body: Well made and a nice weight, color was as expected. I ended up returning it because it was just so so on me and I felt it may stretch a bit more than I'd like because of the weight. Over size, it would be nice for layering but may be bulky. No smell that I noticed. I returned so I am not sure about the washability. Read more
items.author: JJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater is everything
items.body: This sweater is everything. The cuffs have a nice form fitting fit and look good and also handy to role the sleeves up when needed. I like that the color is offset from the sweater adding a nice touch. The buttons are ‘cute as a button’ and the type of sweater is soft but does not pill, and warm but not too heavy. Read more
items.author: imasupergurl91

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: Beautiful green sweater. Good quality. Read more
items.author: R Covington

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft, cute colors
items.body: Very cute, soft fabric, and just like the photo. Read more
items.author: Erin Blair S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfy!!
items.body: This sweat is true to size, good material (it's super comfy!!), and so cute! I'm considering buying another in a different color. Read more
items.author: Kmbrly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, Size bit large
items.body: Great quality sweater! The material feels very durable and soft. The fit was slightly larger than expected, so I’d suggest sizing down if you prefer a snug fit. Overall, very happy with the purchase and the excellent customer service. Read more
items.author: BS

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, Pink, White, Blue, Apricot, Black, Ginger, Coffee, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
